titles.title: Hate Crime Statistics Improvement Act of 2009
To amend the Hate Crime Statistics Act to require the Attorney General to acquire data about crimes that manifest evidence of prejudice based on gender.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E191)
Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
2/3/2009--Introduced.
Hate Crime Statistics Improvement Act of 2009 - Amends the Hate Crime Statistics Act to require the Attorney General to acquire data about crimes that manifest evidence of prejudice based on gender.
